website_summaries.verdict: Brings the cafe into your own home with a variety of custom settings.
pros: Appeals to coffee drinkers that are specific in their tastes but not in their ways
Multiple settings allow for custom coffee creations that are engineered by technology
We love the basic aspects including the aroma this model creates
cons: The maximum temperature could be a bit hotter for some

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee,  Please read update. Customer service redeemed.
customer_reviews.text: While we loved the coffee the machine was high maintenance and completely failed in 5 months in a two person household. Called Jura and after waiting 1/2 hour on hold was put to voice mail which has not been returned after 3 days. Jura also ignored my contact attempts via their web site. Ok, update, finally got through to tech support (hint, use the (201) number) and the nice lady walked me through the solution in 5 minutes and we now have Jura coffee again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The coffee is great we have one problem can anyone help Jura cant
customer_reviews.text: Our first machine Jura S one touch was great lasted many years,the E8 I have one problem with the coffee beans look full machine starts then stops says beans are empty then i have to push the beans down into the hopper with my finger and after that i need to fill the beans up again now every day before having our coffee i have to do the same thing push the beans down into the hopper Jura says its the Starbucks coffee beans i use to oily I always used in the Jura s9 no problems I wish they could fix has anyone else have this problem wish i could upgrade to a better model
customer_reviews.author: kendiane1001

customer_reviews.title: I like the speed of the startup in the morning
customer_reviews.text: Picked this machine after using a friends older model Jura. It is exactly what we were expecting and has been very user friendly. I've tweaked the programs in "Expert" mode to get the items that we make on a regular basis tuned to our taste. I like the speed of the startup in the morning. The instruction booklet could be a let better in some regards but a basic understanding of how coffee machines work will help you interpret the booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Ron2Steps

customer_reviews.title: Favorite coffee machine ever
customer_reviews.text: This machine changed my view on coffee. I used to think I loved coffee, but now im addicted. I find myself excited to wake up, only to turn on my Jura and make a new cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Chase R.

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework on what you really want from a coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for a week and a half and I am in love with it. At first, I was taken back by the price but after you taste your first brewed cup, you smile and so this is worth it. We only have time for our specialty coffees on the weekends. But I am finding that the more I use the machine and get acquainted with the ease of using it. I can have my specialty drink at anytime. Engineered the way I expected the Swiss to do it - just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Andre

customer_reviews.title: 2 months in and some problems
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Jura has amazing customer service reputation. We have had it for less than 2 months and it's wonderful but the dispenser for the espresso where the milk frother is, no longer dispenses the espresso. It comes out from the main dispenser now, not where the cup is placed for the drink. It is under warranty but since it is a discontinued item, it can only be repaired and not replaced. Amazon won't take it back as it is past the return date even though it's a $2k machine and less than 2 mo since purchase. Jura is arranging for repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee and it's quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee! This is our third Jura/Capresso machine in about 22 years. We're purists so all we drink is black Americano and Espresso. So I can't comment on the milk side of things. But this E8 is definitely better than our recently retired S8. It's much quieter, smaller, and makes markedly better coffee. And it's much cheaper than the current S8. The only difference I can discern between the two is that the E8 doesn't have a touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: fpmacko

customer_reviews.title: long awaited coffee machine...
customer_reviews.text: The order came very promptly. I had waited several years to decide whether to splurge on a coffee machine that was my heart's desire... couldn't quite substantiate spending that much on "me", but this year I finally did it. The machine came well packaged, padded and all... it is a state of the arts coffee machine! I love it! Would recommend this seller to all my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Moussia53

customer_reviews.title: Worst espresso machine 😡
customer_reviews.text: Not working after one week, troubleshooting with Jura did not help, total waste of money. Manufacturing defect 😡
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A well-made machine
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with the Jura the first time I used it at my brother's apartment. Now I finally had the funds to get one for myself. Don't regret it one bit. It's an incredibly simple, yet effective machine that enables my healthy caffeine addiction!
customer_reviews.author: DorkKnight

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful espresso
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our 14-year-old Jura E-8 with this model and are happy with it. This is one of the few current Jura models that allows 2 scoops of pre-ground coffee (the other less expensive models are limited to 1 scoop of pre-ground). We have not used the milk frothing feature or pre-programmed specialty drinks, so cannot comment on those. Only concern: how long will all the electronic sensors last?!
customer_reviews.author: AUS_SF

customer_reviews.title: can't speak yet of durability
customer_reviews.text: This is a great invention. It makes great speciality coffee's and is all automatic! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: dhdjms

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Product for home use- initial investment may seem pricey, but worth the cost. Excellent coffee taste and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: We have owned several Jura coffee makers and we find this the best of the lot. Easy to use (after you get use to the key pad). Buy the milk refridg that is separate, a great addition. Almost a one touch deal.
customer_reviews.author: rwaman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic coffee, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our office kitchenette and it's gets used several times each day. Makes fantastic coffee and it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with Jura
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Jura machine. My first lasted over 15 years. I love being able to make lattes and cappuccinos with the push of a button.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This E8 replaces our ENA9 which essentially wore out. The coffee is better and the added benefit of flat white as an option is a big hit at home.
customer_reviews.author: P. T. Tressel

customer_reviews.title: Overall, very nice item.
customer_reviews.text: The ad said there were 3 temperature settings, but they weren’t adjustable. Espresso was Hot. Coffee was Normal. The coffe isn’t very hot, particularly if you use cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The Jura E8 has met all of my expectations. It looks great and makes great coffee. I’m impressed at how easy it is to use. Highly recommend to anyone chasing that perfect cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C Hertel

customer_reviews.title: just opened for Mothers Day!
customer_reviews.text: The water tank & cover were cracked and we were most concerned! How do we handle this situation!
customer_reviews.author: j maurice doucet

customer_reviews.title: Best investment
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much!!! So easy to use and setup and clean
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: and worked fine out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Machine is exactly as described; and worked fine out of the box. I wish the water reservoir was a little bigger but I just have to fill more often.
customer_reviews.author: robert nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee maker we've ever owned. Amazing technology and always a perfect cup of fresh ground.
customer_reviews.author: The Duck

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The machine did not function properly when it was received. I was able to return it for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Sherman Scott

customer_reviews.title: So happy to receive this coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: So happy to receive this coffee machine. I've tried all the settings and know from owning 2 prior models this one should be another good experience.
customer_reviews.author: LHM

customer_reviews.title: I upgraded and am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Jura Super automatic espresso machine. I have been using the Impreza C65 for over a year now and decided to take it to my office and upgrade my home machine to the E8. I have been using it for over a month now and am super impressed with the performance, variety of drinks, quality and ease of use. It is a different world from the C65. I am very happy/impressed with he Jura products thus far and won't hesitate recommending them to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is amazing! I make such delicious coffee at home that I have not purchased coffee since my machine arrived! It will pay for itself in no time with how much I’m saving from not going to coffee shops everyday! It was a surprise gift from my husband! Best. Gift. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: breanne84

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate. Great coffee aroma and temperature. Our 3rd Jura
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down the best Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for an espresso machine that delivered quality and the Jura e8 was it! A perfect espresso every time! Easy to use, clean and maintain. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: guitargearjunkee

customer_reviews.title: Did not work after a week. Machine became clogged ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work after a week . Machine became clogged . Customer service said the expresso beans we used are not to be put on the grind their info stated was appropriate for espressos. Machine returned,
customer_reviews.author: catmo

customer_reviews.title: JURA IS THE BOMB!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re reading these comments, look no further and buy the Jura! It’s a game changer for your morning coffees. I will never have a different coffee machine!
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: This new model is even better, I only wish that it had a button ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Jura, the first being a Jura S-7 which lasted 16 years and brewed over 17,000 cups of coffee. This new model is even better, I only wish that it had a button for brewing two cups of coffee at a time instead of pushing the single cup button twice in under a sec. Difficult to do and 50% of the time I have to brew two seperat cups to fill my mug. Outstanding coffee maker in all other respects
customer_reviews.author: Kiroto

customer_reviews.title: Best deal. Best coffee maker.
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Best coffee we’ve ever made in our home.
customer_reviews.author: MissP

customer_reviews.title: Broken water tank on arrival. Customer service of course ...
customer_reviews.text: Broken water tank on arrival. Customer service of course closed after hours. Will update review depending upon how they handle the repair when they return.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Cold coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Jura customer support said, "The temperature for coffee coming out of the spout should be at least 178 degrees." Tested it several times. Espresso is 130 degrees. Coffee at 150. Adding milk to your drink from the milk system will cool your drink down even more. If you enjoy room temperature coffee, this is the machine for you!
customer_reviews.author: Angry Customer

customer_reviews.title: While it's not far from the Jura league - this machine can't disappoint with the removable brew unit putting the control in ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this machine costs more than the average, however it's not average by far. This is a power house for a true coffee aficionado. The machine is also made with high quality materials setting it apart. While it's not far from the Jura league - this machine can't disappoint with the removable brew unit putting the control in your hands by not having to send the machine in for service like others. Ultimately, you definitely will receive a fabulous machine built to last and sure to find a place in the family.
customer_reviews.author: asher sarig

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line for coffee lovers
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth it. Best cup of coffee you’ll ever have.
customer_reviews.author: Elana Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Jura has become junk;  Only honors warranty if you buy directly from them.
customer_reviews.text: Used to love my Jura machines would happily have paid more for them., but like so many other companies they have become cheap chines made junk. And when your new Jura device dies after a few months they will inform you they only honor the warranty if you buy directly from them. If you keep pressuring them they will eventually send you out a refurbished one that will die from the exact some problem, because even the replacement units are junk now. You might as well be buying something at Wall-Mart.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, amazing machine
customer_reviews.text: We love this machine. It was our second Jura. It’s expensive but we use it more than we use anything else In our lives, including our cars. It makes every day better. It started leaking last week and since we didn’t purchase directly from Jura, I thought we were stuck. Jura sent us shipping labels, fixed it, and sent it back to us. It was seamless and we are now Jura customers for life.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Tired of error code
customer_reviews.text: The cappuccino is awesome. There is maintenance but I expected as much with keeping it hygienic with milk. Every time I clean it descale it there is an error code that the drip tray isn’t fitted. It is such a hassle that at this point I wish I bought something else. I turn it on and off several times, unplug it, wipe everything out. It’s just such a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

product_meta.title: Jura 15097 E8 Espresso Coffee Machine, 28 cm x 35 cm x 35.1 cm, Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:ChromePrepare coffeehouse style specialties in the comfort of your own home with the E8 coffee machine from JURA. Taking inspiration from the world's best baristas, this coffee and espresso system utilizes revolutionary Pulse Extraction Process (PEP) technology which optimizes the extraction time, allowing even short specialty coffees like ristretto and espresso to be prepared with an intensity and breadth of aromas like never before. With eight different intensity levels and 12 programmable specialty beverages, ranging from flat whites and macchiatos to cappuccinos and more, coffee lovers can customize their coffee just the way they like it. The six-level AromaG3 grinder ensures that the coffee is optimally ground, every time, and the innovative fine foam technology delivers fine milk foam that's as light as air to complete your favorite espresso beverage. Packing incredible performance into its compact size, the E8 fits into your home -- and your busy schedule -- seamlessly.
feature_bullets: Chrome with black accents with TFT color display
12 programmable specialties and 8 programmable levels of Coffee strength

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
